Background colour for message boxes.

title.description: Title font for the Message banners. Also used for  'banner-with-backbox'

corner-radius.description: Border radius for the message-container frame

bg.description: Used for the hero component at the top of the landing page

paragraph.description: Text colour for the paragraph conent on the headline-banner

sub-heading.description: Used for the main title on the headline banner at the top of the landing page

paragraph-content.description: Used for the content paragraph on the banner on the top of the landing page

fg.description: Mixed media text colour. Used for headings and paragraphs

title.description: Main title for the mixed-media banner

category.description: Category text shown above main title for the mixed-media banner

paragraph.description: Main content shown below the main title for the mixed-media banner

bg.description: Background colour of the accordion block. This component references the message-container background to keep continuity between the elements

fg.description: Foreground colour of the accordion block.

bg.description: This component references the message-container background to keep continuity between the elements

fg.description: Text colour for any text on the Contact us form. NOTE: this does not include the text linked to the input fields

corner-radius.description: Corner radius for the Contact Us form container

title.description: Contact Us form main title on the landing page

paragraph.description: Contact Us form top paragraph on the landing page

label.description: Used for the terms and conditions text besides the checkbox

title.description: Used for the title on each accordion item. For both open and closed

paragraph.description: Used for the main content; shown when the accordion item is open

small-text.description: Used for small links and notes on the footer
